Package me.ddos.doxel

Interface Summary
NoiseSource A source of scalar noise values located in 3D space.
Polygonizer Generates a triangle mesh from grid cells.
 

Class Summary
Doxel Doxel is a simple rendering engine used for rendering scalar data on an aligned grid.
DoxelApp The main class of this application.
GridCell Represents a cell within a grid of values.
MarchingCubesPolygonizer An implementation of the marching cubes algorithm based on this original implementation.
SimplePerlinNoiseSource A simple perlin noise source.
